Description:
Contemporary Coastal Vibe
This two-storey brick home, situated on a generous 702m² (approx), has been tastefully renovated and boasts a contemporary yet relaxed coastal aesthetic. Upstairs the harbour views are captivating and the open plan living area is spacious and light filled. The adjacent kitchen offers plentiful work and storage space and is perfectly suited to cater for everyday living and entertaining. The rumpus room provides added living space and is all about soaking up the sunshine and views. A master suite, with walk in robe and en-suite, feels like a parents haven and the adjacent study offers a handy space to work from home if required.
Downstairs takes care of the kids or guests with four generous bedrooms and a family sized bathroom with double vanity. Spread out and relax in the second living zone or out in the sunroom, which comes complete with a wet bar and easy flow to the private and fenced garden. Extra storage is always a bonus and this property has plenty of that inside and out with a freestanding double garage and garden shed too.
This magical location is becomingly increasingly well known as a peaceful corner of the Bellarine that enjoys easy access to safe swimming and ocean beaches, nature filled reserves, wineries, golf courses and spectacular scenery. Just a short commute to Geelong, the cafes and boutique shopping of nearby coastal hot spots are within easy reach too. With all the hard work done here there will be plenty of time to enjoy it all.
Insights: 16 Gwinganna Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 4 other 5 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Versatile Site With Potential Bay Views
The Feel:
Quietly positioned in an established court location, this prime allotment provides an opportunity to capitalise on stunning views across Corio Bay within the heart of the Bellarine Peninsula.
Design a contemporary home that takes advantage of the north facing aspect (STCA) or explore the site's development potential by utilising its planning approval for a 2 lot subdivision.
The Facts:
-785sqm approx. allotment with great potential for views
-Plans for two lot subdivision and two dwellings already approved.
-Watch boats pass by on Corio Bay with the You Yangs in the background
-Quiet court location in an established coastal neighbourhood
-Create a spacious and modern home without size limitations (STCA)
-Potential for development with hassle-free housing in high demand (STCA)
-Walk to dog friendly Beacon Point Reserve, Golf Clubs and beach
-Moments to a choice of great schools with bus connections to Geelong
-Central location minutes to wineries, coastal towns and surf beaches
-10mins to Portarlington Ferry Terminal, taking you straight into Melbourne CBD
*All information offered by Bellarine Property is provided in good faith. Description:
A Cut Above the Rest!
What we have on offer is a rare opportunity giving the savvy buyer a whole lot of bang for their buck!
This late 80's architecturally designed home has been tastefully updated. This spacious footprint has an abundance of natural light with a pretty backdrop for each window. From the moment of entry this house will feel like home in so many ways.
Located in a sought - after pocket of Clifton Springs in a quiet court and oozing street appeal, all situated upon a whopping 706m2.
The free-flowing floorplan lends itself to practical zoning; the fore of the home has a spacious living area equipped with a fan forced Jindara wood heater. The master bedroom is generous in size with a well fitted out walk-in robe, split system and ensuite with double shower, stone vanity, toilet, storage and floor to ceiling tiles.
You will find a formal dining space and study/4th bedroom before flowing to the heart of the home. A stylish Block kitchen including stone bench tops, in bench commercial grade sink, double fridge cavity, soft closing drawers, stainless steel quality appliances including an in bench 5 burner gas stove top. The kitchen overlooks the 2nd living making entertaining a breeze. An additional split system and sliding doors leading to the undercover area completes this family space.
The remainder of the home comprises 2 additional bedrooms both with built-in-robes, main bathroom room, separate toilet and a very well-thought-out laundry with yard access.
Large double gates lead to the carport and undercover area before stepping down into a very quaint garden. Beautiful established trees dart the boundary offering privacy, the shade of the 30-year-old Elm tree and perfectly maintained grassed area is the perfect space for the kids to play. A large garden shed and pet enclosure complete this ideal setup.
Features of the home include ceiling fans in all bedrooms and 2nd living area, heating/cooling, quality fittings and fixtures, brilliant storage including loft space accessible via foldout stairs, quality window furnishings and custom light fittings.
This home is simply ideal for the growing family, downsizers and investors alike; you have a great location with the Bay at your fingertips, a spacious home where all the hard work has been done, situated upon a sizeable parcel with room for all the toys. Priced to go this well loved home will not last long.
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.
Insights: 9 Talinga Court, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Investment Opportunity New Price
A BARGAIN. This 2 BR unit is perfectly situated and has all the comforts you could want. The unit consists of spacious light filled living, kitchen and meals area, 2 bedrooms, a central bathroom, separate toilet and laundry. Other features include gas heating, reverse cycle heating-cooling. Private low maintenance courtyard and single lock up garage.
Currently tenanted on a periodic lease $285pw with potential to achieve $300pw. This is a great investment to add to your property portfolio, will suit the downsizer, young couple and first home buyers alike. If you're looking for an excellent lifestyle property within good proximity to the golf course, bowls club, medical facilities and Drysdale main shopping precinct, be sure to inspect this hidden, little gem. Make sure you don't let this opportunity pass you by. GENUINE OFFERS CONSIDERED
Insights: 1/61 Dandarriga Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019.

Address: 40 Beacon Point Road Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Family Gem
Much loved 3-bedroom home on a 604m2 block. Spacious lounge upon entry has bay windows complemented by street views with a formal dining area off to the side. Kitchen has stainless steel stove & range hood, plenty of cupboards followed by a great family area & sliding doors to outside. All 3 bedrooms have built in robes. Master bedroom has an air conditioner. Large central bathroom. Additional features are ducted heating with new unit put in 2017, all windows have locks, security doors, water is temperature controlled, manual roller shutters & double garage. Just a short drive to the bay, boat ramps, shops, doctors, schools, ferry services, local wineries you Bellarine lifestyle awaits you.

Description:
STUNNING LUXURY LIVING WITH VIEWS!
Situated merely metres from the picturesque coastline of Clifton Springs is this magnificent family home built with exceptional attention to detail. Stunning bay views are captured from the upstairs open plan living and dining space which flows out seamlessly to a brilliant outdoor entertaining area equipped with ceiling fan for those balmy summer nights. Upstairs further comprises an amazing kitchen with quality appliances, stone bench top and full butlers pantry, powder room and Master suite complete with bay views, WIR and ensuite with double vanity & insitu shower. Downstairs features 3 generous bedrooms all with BIRs, a formal living space at the front of the home and kids activity/3rd living with access to the lush rear garden at the rear of the home plus a gorgeous central bathroom with freestanding bath. Outside enjoys double car accommodation with drive through access to the rear and a lovely low maintenance garden allowing you more time to enjoy the beautiful Bellarine Peninsula! Further features of this stunning home include zoned security system, zoned ducted heating through out, Split System, an abundance of storage, quality window furnishings, solar panels and ducted vacuum system. This fabulous home is one not to be missed, book your inspection today!

Description:
Coastal Zen
This home away from home will leave you coming back for more! If you are seeking the ideal weekender, you have comfort with the convenience of the Bay at the end of the road. If you are looking to downsize, the astute floor plan has bedrooms and bathrooms both upstairs and down. A savvy investment both long term or, if you want to go down the holiday letting path this is set up and ready to go for peak season.
Entry level buying has never been so enticing, you are not only securing a piece of the Bellarine but all that comes with the coastal lifestyle.
One of two custom built townhouses, separately titled and set across two levels . The ground level welcomes you with timber floors and an uplifting palette of colour, a fantastic space to entertain or curl up with a book.
The designer kitchen comes with all the mod cons and is ideal for cooking up a storm. Overlooking the dining and family room, this design allows you to entertain in style and interact whilst in the kitchen. The lofted ceiling and plethora of light gives this area a sense of comfort and relaxation, access onto the sun-drenched deck is a perfect touch.
Two spacious bedrooms both equipped with built-in- robes and access to a private deck. A well- appointed central bathroom, separate toilet and laundry complete the lower level.
Upstairs steals the show, boasting a stunning master bedroom with its own parent's retreat, ensuite and walk in robe complete with second living area.
Your comfort is assured in this great home, with ducted heating and great airflow, gorgeous easy-care polished concrete and hardwood flooring, ample storage, double lock up garage with remote and internal access low maintenance gardens back and front. Quality workmanship upgraded fixtures and fittings and attention to detail obvious throughout.
This chic townhouse offers low maintenance living and is situated close to schools, shops, public transport and the Bay.
A lifestyle opportunity not to be missed.
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Address: 187 Country Club Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
OVERLOOKING THE GOLF COURSE
Imagine looking out your back windows at the lush green of the Clifton Springs Golf course that you do not even have to take care of? High secure fencing around so the balls stay on the course. This home backs onto the Clifton Springs Golf Course, where you can watch the golfers on the 15th green.
Step back in time to an entrance of slate. From the entrance it opens on to Kitchen,meals,living where the views begin. Climatically controlled by gas central heating and electric cooling. Upstairs there are two bedrooms also with views.
Direct access to entrance via garage. Side access to park the boat, trailer or caravan. Good off street parking.
Established area of Clifton Springs, the suburb that is no longer hidden, it has been discovered.
Started as a satellite city approx. 50 years ago it was slow to grow. When the dual highway was put right through from Leopold people decided it was not that far to commute. Why would you not choose to live on a north facing bay with views?
Insights: 187 Country Club Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
VILLAGE POSITION ! WALK EVERYWHERE ! AS NEW!
Within walking distance of the Drysdale village, parklands and all amenities . Generous proportions as well as natural light enhancing the warm feel of this perfect villa. A spacious lounge room (north facing), adjacent dining and well equipped kitchen with double doors opening to the garden. Two bedrooms a king and a double, both with BIR'S, central bathroom, laundry and separate toilet . Features include walk in pantry, dishwasher, split system, loads of storage, new carpets, quality window furnishings and more. Single garage (direct internal access) as well as second access for another vehicle if required. Absolutely nothing to do , a real gem .

Address: 98 Country Club Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Blue Chip Locale Golf Course Access!
Situated in a blue-chip Clifton Springs locale, this humble abode offers more than meets the eye! With direct access to hole 3 of the Clifton Springs Golf Course and with the Bay just a short stroll away, this home is sure to delight.
Offering a multitude of options for first home buyers, investors, downsizers or those wanting a project, the home is perfect as is or ready for someone to put their own stamp on. First impressions count and upon entry to the home, you're welcomed into a spacious light-filled lounge, which offers sublime front garden views and study nook. The kitchen is equipped with electric cooking, dishwasher, built-in-pantry and ample storage whilst overlooking the dining area which effortlessly flows via sliding doors to an outdoor courtyard. The master bedroom sits at the fore and hosts built-in-robes and ensuite with vanity, shower and toilet, while the two remaining bedrooms, also with built-in-robes, sit from the central hallway. This wing of the home is serviced by a large family bathroom with shower, vanity and bath, with the separate toilet and laundry with outdoor access completing this cute as a button abode.
As pretty as a picture, the manicured gardens both front and back are low maintenance and are the perfect place for those wanting to tinker, with an enclosed fernery, which could be used in a multitude of ways also on offer.
Additional features include: 604m2 block, heating and cooling, alarm system, SLUG, secure front fence and gate and side access with enough room for multiple cars, boats, caravans and everything in between!
Location is forever, and it's not every day that you can secure an entry level home, with so much potential and with direct Golf Course access. With all major amenities, public transport, schools and the best of the Bellarine lifestyle at your fingertips, don't let this rare opportunity pass by.
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
IMMACULATE HOME IN A DESIRABLE LOCATION
This wonderful home set on approx 588m2 features a light & bright north facing front lounge flowing through to an open plan living, dining and modern kitchen at the rear with a superb elevated deck overlooking a lovely landscaped garden. Comprising four comfortable bedrooms including Master with WIR & ensuite, ducted heating and reverse cycle split system for year round comfort. Ideally situated in the seaside town of Clifton Springs, this immaculate home has been lovingly maintained and is ideally suited for families or those looking to retire allowing you to enjoy the spectacular lifestyle on offer here on the Bellarine Peninsula!

Address: 5 Country Club Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Ideal entertainer or family home
Located in sought after Clifton Springs just a leisurely stroll to the waters edge, this immaculate 4-bedroom home is all a family or entertainer could hope for. With a fresh make over and all the work done for you, this home is ready for you to move in and begin your ideal coastal lifestyle.
In an elevated position with views to the You Yangs, the manicured gardens and large double doors welcome you in to the central hall way. To the left, a well-designed lounge and dining area filled with natural light welcomes you. Snuggle up in front of the open fire or create an impressive dinner party for your friends. To the right the master suite with large windows and great proportions is finished with a spacious walk in robe and modern en suite.
Down the hallway, the contemporary kitchen and living space are the heart of the home. Prepare meals for the family or talk to your guests in the open plan space. Utilise all the modern conveniences, ample bench space, dishwasher and storage space found in the kitchen. A covered al fresco area off the living room is ideal for gatherings or casual barbeques. Open the large sliding doors to enjoy the stunning greenery and newly established gardens which create a lush tropical oasis in your own back yard.
To the rear of the home, three further bedrooms are generous in size with built-in robes and ceiling fans. Servicing these bedrooms is an additional family size bathroom that includes a large walk in shower and bath, and a separate toilet. Split system cooling and gas central heating ensure your comfort all year round. An additional large garden to the rear and other side of the house allow plenty of room for play and the double garage has drive through boat or caravan storage at the rear.
This property is central to all attractions and amenities the Bellarine has to offer and is a home for all seasons and occasions. First impressions count & this beautiful family home will not disappoint.

Description:
Peaceful Court Living
Nestled in picturesque gardens in a quiet court, this brick and tile home will appeal to anyone who enjoys peaceful living. Featuring a floor plan that makes the most of the 720m² (approx) north-facing site, this home has interesting angles and an abundance of natural light. The polished solid timber floors in the spacious lounge and dining area are a highlight as are the soaring ceilings and exposed brick feature walls. Step up into the second living zone where the sleek refurbished kitchen will impress with its plentiful storage and quality Bosch appliances. Easy access to the sunny courtyard makes this home an obvious choice for effortless entertaining. With four spacious bedrooms in total, including a generous master with en-suite and walk in robe, there is plenty of room for family and guests. Practical highlights include a renovated laundry and great storage throughout.
With ample off street parking, the large carport is currently used as a private and shady alfresco, providing the perfect outdoor living space on summer days. The hobbyist or craftsperson will love the workshop area in the nearly new freestanding garage. Extra storage is available in the garden shed and a rainwater tank is an added bonus too.
Enjoy sand and sea breezes with safe swimming beaches nearby, or venture just a little further to experience world-class surfing and stunning coastal scenery. With the convenience of Drysdale on the doorstep and Geelong a short commute away, this property is not only packed full of practical benefits but it feels and looks great too.
Insights: 5 Gaddang Court, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Great Home in Established Court
Here is a home that would be ideal for the family or retiree. Only nineteen years young and well maintained, rooms are spacious and zoned. Located close to the local primary school and neighborhood shopping strip. Public transport is also available. Less than five minutes from the Clifton Springs Boat ramp and Curlewis Shopping Centre.
The main bedroom with ensuite has adjacent study or nursery. Living - dining areas are well spaced for entertaining the whole family with a cosy wood heater or gas central heating. The dining area is surrounded by a pleasant outlook to the garden. Adjoining the indoor living is a fantastic outdoor entertaining area with character combustion heater and games area.
Two minor bedrooms with BIRs share the family bathroom. There is ample storage and a great laundry.
The rear yard is a good size on this 716m2 block. Plenty of room for the keen gardener.
Extras are 6mx3m garden shed and 5 KW solar panels.

Description:
SPACIOUS CHARACTER HOME WITH VIEWS, QUIET LOCATION
Located in a quiet cul de sac this solid, established home was built to stand the test of time. With beautiful views across the roof tops to Corio Bay and Geelong from the downstairs living areas and sweeping vistas from the master bedroom and balcony upstairs. The open plan family living area has lofty ceilings and plenty of light filtering through large windows.
Solid timber kitchen cabinetry has been maintained in excellent condition. The second and third bedrooms provide plenty of BIR space and are serviced by the family bathroom. Bed 2 accesses the outdoor patio area.
Upstairs the open gallery takes in the central hub of the home with multiple nooks for quiet sitting areas. A cosy study is located in the loft area over the single garage. The master suite with balcony has stunning secure views to Geelong, Corio Bay and Baie Winery. Ensuite, separate toilet and walk through robe adjoin the master suite.
Side access to the rear yard and shedding is a bonus for the avid fisherman or traveler.
Shed approx 8m x 5m with toilet, sink and plenty of shelving. The lovely rear garden is low maintenance.

Address: 3 Clear Water Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Pretty as a Picture
Beautifully placed right in the heart of the Golf Course precinct is this delightful custom built residence; boasting an unrivaled welcome home feel, it is sure to be highly sought by prospective purchasers!
The stunning garden setting is sure to awaken your every sense; a visual spectacle in full bloom, the tranquility of abundant bird life, lovely floral aromas and the various highly productive fruit trees... yum!
Liveability features including solar panels, cross ventilation and multiple water tanks further endorse the wonderful green lifestyle on offer!
Character filled, light and bright generous living zones and quality fixtures are a consistent theme throughout.
Three beautifully appointed bedrooms; master is positioned to the rear (lovely window features frame the garden) and is complete with dual built in robes and ensuite.
The primary living zone consists of a kitchen/family/meals area. The kitchen boasts expansive bench tops and great storage solutions.
The second independent living area is a real feature! A huge bay window works beautifully with the northerly aspect; a lovely spot to take in early coffee. The gas log fire, decorative cornices and high ceilings create a grand space and add further flexibility to the floor plan.
A sheltered alfresco is paved and provides another sitting area to admire the gardens; I have it on good authority the built in BBQ cooks the best snags
A double garage with the enviable feature of drive through access via rear roller door; room enough for the cars, boat and even the jet ski
All the modern comforts; ducted heating, split system cooling, ceiling fans and many more features to be discovered on further inspection

Address: 141 Beacon Point Road Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Easy Living Upon Approx. 671m2!
Set upon approx. 671m2, this home presents a terrific opportunity for first homebuyers, families, investors, and renovators alike (STCA)! Positioned within easy reach of all that Clifton Springs and Drysdale has to offer, a laidback lifestyle is yours to keep!
Your weekends will be filled with outdoor adventures thanks to the Clifton Springs Golf Course, boat ramp, and scenic coastline just moments away. Public transport and the Delungra Avenue playground are a short stroll from your front door, while the bustling hub of Drysdale places supermarkets, cafes, and restaurants within easy reach. Growing families will be spoilt for choice with Clifton Springs Pre-School, Clifton Springs Primary School, and Drysdale Primary School close by.
The original interiors grant you the option to move straight in or to rejuvenate with a contemporary touch (STCA). The light-filled lounge creates the perfect spot to pop up your feet and relax, while the kitchen/meals zone flows outside. The kitchen is well equipped with a built-in pantry, oven, gas hob, and rangehood.
All three bedrooms feature built-in robes and share close access to the bathroom and separate toilet. The laundry is complete with external access.
Two gas wall heaters and ceiling fans provide comfort.
The secure backyard provides a generous play space for children. Its size also offers the potential for buyers to create a superb outdoor entertaining area or to extend the home (STCA). A rainwater tank and garden shed put the practical elements in place.
The double lock-up garage provides secure parking, while the wide driveway offers additional off-street parking for boats, caravans, or trailers.
Whether you want to move straight in, have plans to renovate (STCA), or youre on the hunt for a great investment opportunity, this home will be at the top of your list! Inspect without delay!

Description:
Love The Home, Love The Lifestyle
Positioned in one of Clifton Spring’s premier neighbourhoods, this immaculate single level home promises an elegant coastal lifestyle, with the benefits of a lush tree canopy at your back door!
Presenting as new, this centrally located home is steps to Drysdale Primary and Drysdale Village, with Clifton Springs’ safe bay beach, friendly Golf Club and boat ramp all just a short drive away.
The Facts:
-Stylish 4BR dual living home central to key family amenities
-Surrounded by newer custom homes in a premium established street
-Set across 633sqm of native landscape with tiered rear garden
-OP living with glass windows and doors capturing natural leafy views
-Dining with sliding glass access to aggregate entertaining alfresco
-Caesarstone kitchen boasts freestanding Westinghouse oven and d/w
-2nd living sits adjacent to elegant master with large WIR and ensuite
-Zoned children’s or guest wing, the 4th BR with sliding door to alfresco
-Undercover outdoor entertaining with bay glimpses and bush aspect
-Drought tolerant native shrubs and trees with no lawn maintenance!
-Ceiling fans, evaporative cooling and ducted gas heating throughout
-Neutral interiors contrast with mature garden vistas from every window
-Heightened ceilings and doors and premium laminate timber flooring
-Plantation shutters to street facing windows and quality roller blinds
-DLUG with rear and int. access, walk-in-linen store and laundry with ext. access
-600m to Drysdale Primary School and 100m to Sundial Reserve and playground
The Owner Loves…
“We love walking in through the front door and seeing the greenery of the bushland at the rear, and the birdlife we get to see is something quite special. It’s so quiet, the streets are filled with lovely homes and the park in our street is great for kids.”

Description:
YOU YANGS ARE YOUR VIEW BACK DROP
Whether you are relaxing on the balcony or hard at work in the kitchen you will be positioned perfectly to watch the ships coast through the bay with the You Yang's as there back drop.
Situated in the quiet and elevated Taronga Court is this brick veneer home. The kitchen is neat and is well equipped with plenty of bench and cupboard space and tiled floor. The family room has timber floor boards providing a nice warm feeling and access to the sunny north facing balcony.
The master bedroom features an ensuite and all 3 bedrooms offer BIR's and study nooks. Behind the double carport you will find a workshop/studio as well as a separate garden shed. Under the house is another large sealed storage area.
A 9000lt water tank services the garden with an electric pump. The back yard is enormous and the size of the land provides many options for a pool if desired.
With a little work this home can be restored to its former glory. The bathrooms are done and the kitchen is very functional. So if you are looking for a project with a view then why not arrange to have a look.
